combat1.name: Normal Attack: Sparkling Scatter
combat1.descriptionRaw:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Shoots gems that deal <color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>.
Upon hit, this grants Ningguang 1 Star Jade.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of stamina to fire off a giant gem that deals <color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>.
If Ningguang has any Star Jades, unleashing a Charged Attack will cause the Star Jades to be fired at the enemy as well, dealing additional DMG.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Gathering the might of Geo, Ningguang plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals <color=#FFE699FF>AoE Geo DMG</color> upon impact with the ground.
combat1.description:
Normal Attack
Shoots gems that deal Geo DMG.
Upon hit, this grants Ningguang 1 Star Jade.

Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of stamina to fire off a giant gem that deals Geo DMG.
If Ningguang has any Star Jades, unleashing a Charged Attack will cause the Star Jades to be fired at the enemy as well, dealing additional DMG.

Plunging Attack
Gathering the might of Geo, Ningguang plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Geo DMG upon impact with the ground.

combat2.name: Jade Screen
combat2.descriptionRaw: Ningguang creates a Jade Screen out of gold, obsidian, and her great opulence, dealing AoE Geo DMG. Jade Screen 路Blocks opponents' projectiles. 路Endurance scales based on Ningguang's Max HP. Jade Screen is considered a Geo Construct and can be used to block certain attacks, but cannot be climbed. Only one Jade Screen may exist at any one time. The canvas of stars is written upon this jade screen.
combat2.description:
Ningguang creates a Jade Screen out of gold, obsidian, and her great opulence, dealing AoE Geo DMG.

Jade Screen
路Blocks opponents' projectiles.
路Endurance scales based on Ningguang's Max HP.

Jade Screen is considered a Geo Construct and can be used to block certain attacks, but cannot be climbed. Only one Jade Screen may exist at any one time.
combat2.flavorText: The canvas of stars is written upon this jade screen.

combat3.name: Starshatter
combat3.descriptionRaw: Gathering a great number of gems, Ningguang scatters them all at once, sending homing projectiles at her opponents that deal massive Geo DMG. If Starshatter is cast when a Jade Screen is nearby, the Jade Screen will fire additional gem projectiles at the same time. Stars shatter. Silence falls.
combat3.description:
Gathering a great number of gems, Ningguang scatters them all at once, sending homing projectiles at her opponents that deal massive Geo DMG.
If Starshatter is cast when a Jade Screen is nearby, the Jade Screen will fire additional gem projectiles at the same time.

passive1.name: Backup Plan
passive1.descriptionRaw: When Ningguang is in possession of Star Jades, her Charged Attack does not consume Stamina.
passive1.description: When Ningguang is in possession of Star Jades, her Charged Attack does not consume Stamina.

passive2.name: Strategic Reserve
passive2.descriptionRaw: A character that passes through the <color=#FFD780FF>Jade Screen</color> will gain a 12% <color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG Bonus</color> for 10s.
passive2.description: A character that passes through the Jade Screen will gain a 12% Geo DMG Bonus for 10s.

passive3.name: Trove of Marvelous Treasures
passive3.descriptionRaw: Displays the location of nearby <color=#FFD780FF>ore veins used in forging</color> on the mini-map.
passive3.description: Displays the location of nearby ore veins used in forging on the mini-map.
